value.0: Ah, a surfacer. If there's anything you need, I'm here to help. Feel free to look over my inventory. Or is there something else?
Farewell, surfacer. If you ever want to buy or upgrade any weapons, you know where to find me.
Questions aren't really my strength, but I'll do my best to help you out.
Nothing more than what you've already heard, I'm sure. I hear she used to be one of the Matron Mothers from Menzoberranzan, but that might just be a rumor.
All I know is that her army will crush us all if we don't find a way to stay united against her. I just hope House Maeviir is smart enough to realize this.
Well, it used to be the ancestral home of House Maeviir. But since we moved in - I mean the Seer and her followers - it's more like a refugee camp.
As you can imagine, there's a lot of tension here. Most drow don't like the followers of Eilistraee, and House Maeviir is no exception. They don't have much choice, though.
If we don't band together, the Valsharess will sweep us all away. If we can stay united, then at least we'll have a chance. Or so the Seer says.
I came here with the Seer, but I'm not a follower of Eilistraee. Not everyone who follows the Seer shares her religious convictions.
Some of us are just drow fleeing the Valsharess. Several of the powerful drow Houses have been all but wiped out by her army, leaving the handful of survivors to get by however they can.
My story's nothing special. I started learning my craft at a young age, and my skills quickly brought me to the attention of Matron Usala of House Zarosta in Ched Nasad.
But when the Valsharess first came to power, House Zarosta refused to join her... a big mistake. The Valsharess wiped out the entire house. For all I know, I'm the only survivor.
During my flight from Ched Nasad, I encountered some followers of Eilistraee. They took pity on me and brought me to the Seer, and I've been part of her entourage ever since.
Armor and weapons, mostly... though weapons are my specialty.
Goodbye.
I want to ask you some questions.
Do you know anything about the Valsharess?
What can you tell me about this camp?
I want to ask you something else.
So you're a follower of Eilistraee?
Tell me more about yourself.
What kind of things do you sell here?
Let me see what you have for sale, then.
